author: ETMarkets.com
title: RBI Guv full speech: Banks to make extra NPA provision, no dividend till Sept
description: Since March 27, 2020 when I spoke to you last, the macroeconomic and financial landscape has deteriorated, precipitously in some areas; but light still shines through bravely in some others, Das said.
content: Today, humanity faces perhaps the trial of its time as COVID-19 grips the world in its deadly embrace. Everywhere, as also in India, the mission is to do whatever it takes to prevent epidemiological curve from steepening any further. Human spirit is ignited b… [+21833 chars]
